concept.title: Select Objects First
concept.shortdesc: You can select objects first and then choose how to modify them. As you select each object, it is highlighted with small squares called grips, which appear at strategic points on the object.

conbody.p: The locations of the grips depend on the type of object selected. For example, grips appear at the endpoints and midpoint of a line, at the quadrant points and the center point of a circle, and at the endpoints, midpoint, and center of an arc.

After you select one or more objects, you can choose an object modification command, such as Copy or Move, fromthe Modify menu or toolbar. You can also click the right mouse button to display a shortcut menu containing the object modification commands appropriate for the selected objects, and then choose the command fromthe menu.
